title: Fara first look at upcoming F/AR gravel, all-road bike & integrated bikepacking bags
content:
Back in January, Fara Cycling teased their new F/AR adventure bike, blurring the lines between all-road versatility and fast gravel, with its integrated strapless & quick-release bikepacking bags. Now we get a first true look at the real bike and those magnetically attached bags, which you can pre-order now to become your ultimate mixed-surface adventure [â€¦]

The post Fara first look at upcoming F/AR gravel, all-road bike & integrated bikepacking bags appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
